pr_title: Adds errorneous facet to processes page

timeline.message:
Adds errorneous facet to processes page

- Fixes: SIRI-274

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            Process.errorneous = Errorneous
          
          
            
            Process.errorneous = Erroneous
timeline.author: idlira
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -508,6 +508,7 @@ PersonData.title = Title
 Process = Process
 Process.completed = Completed
 Process.counters = Performance
+Process.errorneous = Errorneous

replies.bodyText: Huh, seems like the field is named wrongly
replies.author: fhaScireum

timeline.bodyText: Actually ERRONEOUS ist the right word.
timeline.author: idlira
